title: Create Payment History Component
description: Develop UI component for displaying payment history with filtering, export capabilities, and summary information

user_stories: As a customer, I want to view payment history so that I can track my transactions
As a service provider, I need to analyze payment trends so that I can manage my business
business_rules: Payment history must display transaction history with filtering capabilities
Payment history must support export to common formats
Payment history must show summary information
Payment history must follow the design system
edge_cases: Handling large payment histories with pagination
Managing export functionality with large datasets
Displaying summary information with proper calculations

acceptance_criteria: Payment history component displays transactions with filtering
Payment history component supports export to common formats
Payment history component shows summary information
Payment history component follows the design system
Payment history component integrates with Payment Management API endpoints

endpoints.description: Get all payments with optional filtering

integration_tests: Payment history integration with backend APIs

additional_context.technical_notes: Implement payment history component following Angular best practices. Ensure proper integration with payment management API. Implement export functionality and summary information display.
additional_context.security_considerations: Ensure proper authorization checks for payment history access. Implement appropriate privacy controls for payment information display. Protect sensitive payment information during export.
